title: How to Speak Science by Bruce Benamran (.epub)
description:
How to Speak Science: Gravity, Relativity, and Other Ideas That Were Crazy Until Proven Brilliant by Bruce Benamran

Requirements: .ePUB reader

Overview: As smartphones, supercomputers, supercolliders, and AI propel us into an ever more unfamiliar future, How to Speak Science takes us on a rollicking historical tour of the greatest discoveries and ideas that make today’s cutting–edge technologies possible. 

Wanting everyone to be able to “speak” science, YouTube science guru Bruce Benamran explains–as accessibly and wittily as in his acclaimed videos–the fundamental ideas of the physical world: matter, life, the solar system, light, electromagnetism, thermodynamics, special and general relativity, and much more.

Genre: Non-Fiction > Educational
